pages.text: $(li)The Shulker Head is an item that can be used for craft the $(l:patchouli:weapons/zero_gravity_crossbow)Zero Gravity$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can only be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:bosses/ender_guardian)Ender Guardian$(/l) on death.
